channel.title: Castle Wars problems
channel.description:
This is not a double thread....This is a different topic...
Anywho, no more errors!!! YAY! But....Castle Wars is still not working? When I click on the portals they do not work...? Wtf?
Any help here...?

item.title: Castle Wars problems
item.dc:creator: @P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut `Lewk_
item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

[quote=“xxlukexx, post:47, topic:266098”][quote author=Setsuna link=topic=351329.msg2697703#msg2697703 date=1236383980]

You aren’t calling the methods. Therefore they aren’t doing anything.
You should call cwObjects and cwObjects2 under case 132 in your Client class.

THANK YOU

And for all you others.

I’ve had this for awhile. That’s all I needed to know. I knew how to make portals. I know how to make it add an item when you walk through a portal but was wondering why all of this stuff I ALREADY HAVE was not working.

Once again, THANK YOU, qwertyuiop.
[/quote]

omfg, really??

why did u add the portal code to your c wars file and not your client class file?[/quote]He can’t see with my shit in his eyes.

Read full topic

Sorry…

Okay, guess I’de need to add timers as well? Though the timers where in the castlewars.java but when I go into the waiting rooms no timers come up so…

…

And wow. Flamers, please gtfo of my thread.

why are you quoting your own post and saying that you flame your own thread…
[/quote]I rofl’d at his stupidity. [quote author=primadude link=topic=351329.msg2697681#msg2697681 date=1236383548]

Okay…So also…Shouldn’t it also give me that cloak when I enter because of the castlewars class? Just wondering 'cause it isn’t either. Lol.

As P 1 M P 3 D said before; NOT EVERYTHING COMES IN THE SERVER WHEN YOU GET IT, YOU NEED TO ADD YOUR OWN SHIT TO IT.
[/quote] Thank you.[/quote]

Anytime ;).
